intro: Knowltonia brevistylis, commonly known as the short-styled flame flower, is a species of flowering plant native to the southeastern United States. It belongs to the Malvaceae family, which includes hibiscus and cotton. The plant is characterized by its showy, bright red to orange flowers that bloom in late summer.
